annonstext:
Job description

Randstad is now looking for a positive and proactive Strategic Sourcing Manager in Indirect procurement to our client in the pharmaceutical industry.  Do you have 5-10 years experience from a position as a purchaser? Do you also have experiences from Indirect procurement and is a teamplayer that wants to join an exciting journey? Apply today!

Responsibilities

As a Strategic Sourcing Manager you will coordinate, lead and drive  Sourcing projects in a Global cross-functional environment and to actively participate in the development of Indirect procurement within the company. In your role you will be responsible for sourcing projects within indirect procurement  where you will lead procurement activities in close cooperation with stakeholders within  the organisation.

Daily tasks could be:

	Develop and implement Sourcing and Supplier strategies 
	Independently drive the entire purchasing process from start to finish towards  agreed objectives and within agreed deadlines 
	Lead cross-functional projects and manage relations with key stakeholders and  suppliers 
	Be responsible for negotiations with various suppliers and follow-up on signed  agreements and deliverables 
	Measure and monitor performance within your projects 
	Continuously contribute to the evolvement of our purchasing processes and supporting processes

You will be a part of an Indirect Procurement team of 5 people and you will report to Director of Indirect Procurement. 

Working hours

	Start immediately and continues for 4 month initially
	Stockholm/remote
	Mon-fri, officehours, full-time

Qualifications

	 5-10 years of experience from a wide  role in purchasing where you have been responsible for the entire purchasing process
	You have a relevant University degree or equivalent and solid experience in running successful purchasing projects
	You are a successful negotiator who is knowledgeable in agreements and have good knowledge of both commercial and legal terms
	You have experience running change management projects and working with many different  stakeholders, preferably cross border
	Good communication skills
	Fluent in English and are not afraid to challenge
	You are independent but  good at cooperating with others and like to drive change
	Experienced user in Excel and PowerPoint 
	Excellent analytical skills

Good to have:

	Experiences from the pharmaceutical industry

Application

Last date to apply: 2021-03-28, selection and interviews will take place on an ongoing basis. The position may be filled before the last application date, so apply as soon as possible. 

About the company

With more than 600 000 employees in 38 countries, Randstad is the global leader in the HR services industry and offers staffing, consulting and recruitment solutions in all areas of expertise. We also offer interim management, executive search and outplacement services. We have a large network of clients and candidates, which means that we convey hundreds of jobs within different industries all over Sweden. Our ambition is to be the best employer in the market. 

By combining our passion for people with the power of today’s technology, we help people and organizations to reach their true potential. We call it Human Forward.
